Name: Alien Infection
About the game: Alien Infection is a Hardcore Arcade Twin-Stick Shooter , featuring full VR support . Building this game my goal was to create a simple yet addictive experience with high replayability value. I was greatly inspired by many successful arcades, top-down actions and zombie shooters. What started as a simple twin stick shooter resulted in a beautifully violent hardcore game. Plot: Humanity has found a nuclear energy source on the passing asteroids. The energy crystals people were mining for several years appear to be a non-biological alien life form. Aliens are infecting and killing people rapidly, turning human bodies into biological vessels. Game features: Fast paced action Addictive arcade gameplay Survival mode to climb leaderboard Campaign Blood and gore!
